sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"区别，辨别"之意。
means: discern ： 语义较笼统，着重精深与准确的观察力，不一定有能分辨关系密切的各项事物的含义。
discriminate ： 语气强，指从十分相似的事物中辨出差异，尤其把好坏区分开来。
distinguish ： 普通用词，指辨别者的能力或实际观察到的区别，强调辨别所需的技巧。

sentence.Network_en: The device can discriminate between the cancerous and the normal cells.
sentence.Network_cn: 这台仪器可以辨别癌细胞和正常的细胞。

sentence.Network_en: The Commission for Racial Equality teaches organisations not to discriminate.
sentence.Network_cn: 种族平等委员会告诫各家机构不要心存歧视。

sentence.Network_en: The computer program was unable to discriminate between letters and numbers.
sentence.Network_cn: 这计算机程序不能辨别字母与数字。

辨和辩选字的时候怎么区别啊?_百度知道 ... 辨析[ discrimination] 辨证[ discriminate] 辩驳[ refute].
美国大学翻译中文 16_书面语语_DuSystem... ... 判 discern 判 discriminate 判 sentence.

list.abs: 项目管理术语英汉对照表 - MBA智库百科 ... Discrete Task 离散任务 Discrimination 歧视 Discussion 讨论.
大学英语六级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... discourse n． 演讲；论文 discrimination n． 辨别；识别力；歧视 disgrace n． 失宠，耻辱，丢脸.
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... discrete uniform distribution 离散均匀分布 discriminant 判别式 disjoint 不相交的.
...与行为类似于属性的类相联系的值；也就是说，它的每个实例都有唯一的值。见鉴别器(discriminator)、角色名(rolename)语义

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin discriminat- 'distinguished between', from the verb discriminare, from discrimen 'distinction', from the verb discernere (see discern)

entry.def: If you can discriminate between two things, you can recognize that they are different.

example.ex: He is incapable of discriminating between a good idea and a terrible one...
The device can discriminate between the cancerous and the normal cells.
example.tran: 这台仪器可以辨别癌细胞和正常的细胞。

entry.def: To discriminate against a group of people or in favour of a group of people means to unfairly treat them worse or better than other groups.

example.ex: They believe the law discriminates against women.
example.tran: 他们认为该项法律歧视女性。

example.ex: ...legislation which would discriminate in favour of racial minorities...

means.word_mean: 2. treat differently on the basis of sex or race

sentences.sentence: "I could not discriminate the different tastes in this complicated dish"

means.word_mean: 1. marked by the ability to see or make fine distinctions;

auth_sentence.content: Generally our government doesn't discriminate any ethnic groups.
auth_sentence.res_content: Generally our government doesn't discriminate any ethnic groups.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Generally our government doesn't discriminate any ethnic groups.

auth_sentence.content: What we have here is a failure to discriminate.
auth_sentence.res_content: What we have here is a failure to discriminate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What we have here is a failure to discriminate.

auth_sentence.content: They have to learn how to discriminate among them.
auth_sentence.res_content: They have to learn how to discriminate among them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They have to learn how to discriminate among them.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"分开,分离,去掉"; 2. 表示"否定,不,消失掉"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+graceful优美的→adj.可耻的, 不名誉的
dis否定,不,消失掉+honest诚实的→adj.不诚实的
dis否定,不,消失掉+incline愿意→adj.不愿的
dis否定,不,消失掉+passionate有激情的→adj.平心静气的
dis否定,不,消失掉+solute溶解→溶解开来→没有限制→放荡的
dis否定,不,消失掉+son声音+ant……的→声音不[好听]
dis分开,分离,去掉+cern搞清,确定+ment表名词→确定不同之处→有眼光

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+advantage优点,有利条件→n.不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+may能→不能做事→沮丧;参考:五月能种粮食,所以叫May
dis否定,不,消失掉+order顺序→没有顺序
dis否定,不,消失掉+proof证实→不证实→反证
dis分开,分离,去掉+course课程,教程→分解课程→论述→论文
dis分开+play=ply重叠→打开折叠→显示出来
dis分开,分离,去掉+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
dis分开,分离,去掉+burse钱包→从钱包中分出→支出
dis分开,分离,去掉+crimin分辨→ate→分辩开
dis分开,分离,去掉+cuss敲打→把[问题]分开敲→讨论
dis分开,分离,去掉+miss送→分开送出→解散
dis分开,分离,去掉+part部分→分成部分→分开
dis分开,分离,去掉+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]
dis分开,分离,去掉+semin种子+ate表动词→散布[种子]
dis分开,分离,去掉+tend伸展,拉→分开伸展→膨胀
dis分开,分离,去掉+tract拉→把[心]拉开→分心
dis不+adapt使适应→v.使不适应
dis否定,不,消失掉+appear出现→不出现→消失
dis否定,不,消失掉+arm武装→去掉武装
dis否定,不,消失掉+courage勇气→v.使失去勇气
dis否定,不,消失掉+cover盖→把盖揭开→发现
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+like喜爱→不喜爱
dis否定,不,消失掉+organize组织→解散组织
dis否定,不,消失掉+pel推→推开→驱除

means.word_mean: 分别, 辨别, 区分

sentences.en: Death does not discriminate; it comes to everyone.
sentences.cn: 死亡对每个人都一视同仁, 它会降临到每个人的身上。

sentences.en: They can discriminate hundreds of colours.
sentences.cn: 他们能分辨上百种颜色。

means.word_mean: 歧视, 有差别地对待

sentences.en: The new law discriminates against lower-paid workers.
sentences.cn: 这条新法律歧视低工资的工人。

jushi.english: Death does not discriminate; it comes to everyone.
jushi.chinese: 死亡对每个人都一视同仁,它会降临到每个人的身上。

jushi.english: A climber must learn to discriminate as to when compass bearings are necessary and when they are not.
jushi.chinese: 一个登山者必须学会判断什么时候需要罗盘测定方位,什么时候不需要。

jushi.english: This boy can discriminate minute variations in tone.
jushi.chinese: 这位男孩能辨别出音调的细微变化。
